resources.string: Tap on the top image to play startup and death sound
Tap on the top image to play startup sound
This machine does not have startup or death sound
Long press the top image to view the large image
Long press any entry to copy information
Tap below to access more specifications
The current volume is too high. Do you want to proceed playing?\nSelect \"Confirm\" to turn this warning off temporarily.\nGo to preferences page to turn this function off.
Open the drawer to navigate inside the application. Open the menu to access more options and get help.
Press the back button again to exit MacIndex

Open Directly in EveryMac is enabled. MacIndex will open the EveryMac Page of the machine directly instead of the Specification Page. If you want to disable this function, please access the Preferences Page.
Sort by time again to ensure correct positions for machines not in the same category. Turn off can make the loading faster. This affects the Main Page and Search Page.
Sort by time or sort by the order of addition. Turn off can make the loading faster. This affects the Bookmark Page and Comment Page.
Open the EveryMac Page of the machine directly instead of the Specification Page. Will ask for specific configuration if the machine has more than one configurations.
This is effective for both Main Page and Search Page. Some functions will no longer be available as well.
Play startup and death sound alternatively in the Specification Page, or play the startup sound only.
Enable high volume warning when using headphones in the Specification Page.
Enable buttons to navigate between machines in the Specification Page.
Always override the navigation range to the belonged category.
Only pick random machines inside the current group instead of all categories.
Save the last selected filter and viewing method.
Save the last used filter and search options.
Save the last selected machines and column.
If only one search result was found, then open it directly.
Saved preference file will be completely cleared, including your preferences and all usage records. After you confirm, MacIndex will quit. This is helpful for troubleshooting, but cannot be undone.
For instructions on each item, please see help.
Input contains illegal character(s) for the current searching option. Please double check your input, then try again.
Input exceed the maximum allowed length for the current searching option. Please double check your input, then try again.
This can evaluate the performance of the current version MacIndex.
Benchmark has completed. This reflects the performance of the current version of MacIndex. Lower is better.
Benchmark has completed. Based on the score, enabling enhanced sorting is not recommended. Turning it off will improve your experience. You can enable it later at the preferences page.

Benchmark has completed. Based on the score, enabling enhanced sorting is recommended. Turning it on can ensure the correct order and will not impact your experience. You can disable it later at the preferences page.
Benchmark was interrupted. Please do not use your phone or leave MacIndex during the process.
The special character \'│\' is internally used by MacIndex and cannot be included in the comment
Input is too long, the max limit for each machine is 500 characters
Access all existing comments in the Comment Page.
More than one configurations were found for this machine. Please make a selection then confirm.
Due to sale region or special purpose, this machine is not available in EveryMac
Sorry, but this page is only available in Chinese. Proceed to the page?
Please report the bug to the developer. It is recommended to restart the application.
Benchmark in progress, please wait. Do not use your phone or leave MacIndex.
No comment has been saved yet. You can add a comment at any Specification Page.
No comment has been saved yet
Please select the comment(s) to delete. This cannot be undone.
All existing comments will be deleted. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
No folder has been created yet. You can create a new folder right now, or you can create it later at the Bookmark Page.
No folder has been created yet
Please select the folder(s). Manage your bookmark folders in the Bookmark Page.
Please select the folder(s) to delete. This cannot be undone.
Please select the folder to rename.
The special character \'│\' is internally used by MacIndex and cannot be included in the folder name
Input is too long, the max limit for each folder is 1 line and 30 characters
This name was already specified and cannot be reused
You can only create no more than 15 folders.
All folders will be deleted. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
You need at least 2 machines in the compare list to compare them. You can add a machine at any Specification Page.

string-array.item: You need at least 2 machines in the compare list\nCurrently the list is empty
You need at least 2 machines in the compare list\nCurrently there are only 1 in the list

resources.string: Please select machines to compare in the submenu
The compare list will be deleted. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
Please select the machine(s) to delete from the compare list. This cannot be undone.

For reference only\nRotate your device to change the orientation
Randomly entered one of your bookmarked machine.
Select at least one entry to continue

To open the corresponding specification page directly, paste one of the following supported information:
• Machine name in MacIndex
• Any sharing information copied from MacIndex
• MacIndex share link generated by MacIndex
Cannot read the information, or this machine does not exist in current version
